data.name: World of Warships - Indianapolis Pack
data.detailed_description:
This DLC is not compatible with an account created outside of Steam.

Indianapolis is a truly versatile warrior.
Thanks to the Surveillance Radar consumable and high range of fire, this cruiser is excellent in the support role, and its effective primary armament lets you duel confidently against enemy same-tier cruisers. Also, don't forget about its increased profitability in XP and Credits!

The bundle also includes the following:
  • commander with 6 skill points
  • Port slot
  • 2500 Doubloons
  • 50x Equal Speed Charlie London, Papa Papa, India Bravo Terrathree, Zulu, and Zulu Hotel signals
  • +200% XP for each of the first 25 battles on Cruiser Indianapolis.

data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Czech, Japanese*, Polish*, Russian*, Thai, Turkish, Spanish - Spain, Korean*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Traditional Chinese*, Italian*, Simplified Chinese*, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 x86
  • Processor: Core2Duo 2.7 GHz, AMD Athlon II 3 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8800GT/9600GT, IntelHD 4000, NVIDIA GeForce 620M, AMD Radeon HD 4650
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX 9.0c
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 x64 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570, AMD six-core 3,5 Ghz (AMD FX 6300)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 550 Ti, GeForce GTX 560M, AMD Radeon R7 250
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX 9.0c
